last_episode_to_air.name: July in Jeju & August in Seoul
last_episode_to_air.overview: Back in Jeju Island, Hyo-lee and Sang-soon bring the duo to the recording studio. And in Seoul, their journey closes out with a welcome surprise.

name: The Hungry and the Hairy
overview: On the motorbike road trip of their dreams, buddies Rain and Ro Hong-chul relax and unwind as they delight in tasty eats and scenic locales around Korea.

episodes.name: April in Jeju I
episodes.overview: With shiny new bikes, Rain and Hong-chul kick off their adventure on a rainy day in Jeju Island. Locals Lee Hyo-lee and Lee Sang-soon join for dinner.

episodes.name: April in Jeju II
episodes.overview: The pals cruise along Jeju's emerald-colored coast and flower-lined roads. The loser of a vote on whose bike is cooler faces a fish-tastic punishment.

episodes.name: April in Gochang
episodes.overview: A hands-on experience of Gochang's natural treasures awaits, from rock climbing and clamming in the mudflats to a breathtaking sunset ride on the beach.

episodes.name: May in Busan I
episodes.overview: Zipping through Busan on Harley-Davidsons, the friends stuff their bellies with local specialties. Later, they place a bet on who's the better swimmer.

episodes.name: May in Busan II
episodes.overview: Bad weather can't deter Rain and Hong-chul from enjoying the perfect beach day. Once the clouds clear, the pals soak in some fun and sun on a yacht.

episodes.name: May in Gangwon I
episodes.overview: The pair zooms through the lush, winding mountains of Gangwon-do for a camping trip. To Rain's embarrassment, Hong-chul becomes his stylist for the day.

episodes.name: May in Gangwon II
episodes.overview: Actor Lee Ha-nee jumps on a Vespa alongside Rain and Hong-chul for a picnic to a hidden creek. Back at the campsite, the trio feasts on a savory dinner.

episodes.name: June in Gyeongju
episodes.overview: Historical Gyeongju offers a hearty breakfast and plenty of sightseeing. Reminiscing about their younger days, the duo gets silly at an amusement park.

episodes.name: June in Namhae
episodes.overview: Riding on Triumphs through stunning Namhae by the sea, the friends visit an impressive bike gallery and catch epic ocean views at every turn.

episodes.name: July in Jeju & August in Seoul
episodes.overview: Back in Jeju Island, Hyo-lee and Sang-soon bring the duo to the recording studio. And in Seoul, their journey closes out with a welcome surprise.
